title: 'Erasing history': Russia closes top rights group, capping year of crackdowns
content:
1. 'Erasing history': Russia closes top rights group, capping year of crackdowns  Reuters
  2. Russian court orders closure of leading rights group Memorial  Al Jazeera English
  3. Russian Court Orders Liquidation of the Human Rights Group Memorial  The New York Times
  4. Russia orders shutdown of human rights group for creating 'false image' of USSR  Fox News
  5. Factbox-Memorial: Moscow shuts down chronicler of Soviet-era crimes  Reuters India
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
